thread.section_title: Its4women Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Its4women | www.its4women.ie
thread.title: Jeffery Reid

author: Jeffery Reid
title: Jeffery Reid
text: Fairly easy and straightforward to sign up. I think the thing to remember is that this is heavily discounted for a reason. They don't pay for all the staff that one of the more expensive insurance companies would have. This means correspondence is almost exclusively web-based and you may end up having to wrestle a bit more with the paperwork when you need something. If you are OK with that you cant beat the price.
